text: Can you add the following CSS to the image or image class: `margin: 0 auto; float: none; max-width: (width of the image)`
does anyone know what this error console message means? I can’t figure out what the issue is, especially because the only change I made was setting the background color.

I've added this in the html module:

`<div class="cpbp_wrap" style="background-image:url({{ module.background_image.src }})">`

      `<h1>`

  `</div>`
`</div>`
